qumulo

Class SolutionTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • qumulo.SolutionTest

  • public class SolutionTest
extends java.lang.Object
     This class implements test for main two methods @Solution.produce(String) and Solution.combine(String, String)

 After all test cases, Cleanup is performed and deleted all the temp files and output files generated.
 If you want to analyse output files, comment out @deleteOutputFile() method.

 This implements three test cases.
  1.  Given an Invalid input file(which doesn't present), Solution.produce(String) function should show error and close.

  2.  Given a Valid input file, Solution.produce(String) function should produce valid output.
      and upon passing any two strings from that output to the @Solution.combine(String, String), it should generate valid output file same as input file.

  3.  Given a Valid input file, Solution.produce(String) function should produce valid output.
      and upon passing any file twice to the @Solution.combine(String, String), it should generate error saying "Invalid input files provided"
